# Statistics

> Standard library statistical functions.

<!-- <usage> -->

## Usage

``` javascript
var statistics = require( '@stdlib/math/generics/statistics' );
```

#### statistics

Standard library statistical functions.

``` javascript
var stats = statistics;
// returns {...}
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better examples -->

``` javascript
var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();
var statistics = require( '@stdlib/math/generics/statistics' );

console.log( getKeys( statistics ) );
```
